title: Onion and mustard gravy
ingredients: ['1 large sweet onion, halved then sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil (or margarine)', '4 heaped teaspoons gravy granules', '300ml boiling water', '3 tablespoons mustard (see tip)', '200ml light cream', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'fresh or dried thyme, to taste (optional)']
